name: Kirby.exe (Untrue Air)
description: A long time ago I made a prototype for some sort of platforming game. If it were to be finished, it may or may not include Kirby. However, I used him, Megaman, and Mario as placeholders so I didn't have to make sprites for them. The controls are WASD or the arrow keys to move, space to sprint, and shift to attack (though this is unfinished). I gave up on it and revisited it just now to turn it into a .exe game. I hope it's scary enough, though there is more Red Mist in this game than Kirby. There are 2 possible endings.
